identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a premium, classical violin learning experience that feels like a private conservatory, not a generic SaaS.
identity.aesthetic: Dark Academia meets Modern Minimalist. Warm woods, deep shadows, and golden accents.

theme.description: A rich, immersive dark theme suitable for low-light practice sessions. Avoids pure black; uses deep warm greys and browns.

headings.usage: All section titles, hero text, and major labels. Gives the classical feel.

body.usage: UI elements, lesson text, settings, menus. Clean and readable.

strategies.dashboard: Asymmetric grid. Hero stats (large), Next Lesson (medium), Tuner (small/quick access).
strategies.lesson_view: Split screen. Video/Content on left (66%), Progress/Notes on right (33%).
strategies.sheet_music: Full immersive view with floating controls.

buttons.primary: rounded-full px-8 py-3 bg-primary text-white hover:bg-primary-hover transition-transform hover:scale-105 active:scale-95 shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(217,119,6,0.2)]
buttons.secondary: rounded-full px-6 py-3 border border-stone-600 hover:bg-stone-800 transition-colors

cards.style: bg-stone-800/50 border border-stone-700/50 backdrop-blur-md rounded-2xl overflow-hidden hover:border-primary/50 transition-colors duration-300

tuner_ui.style: Minimalist Analog Gauge. Needle moves smoothly. Central 'In Tune' zone glows Green. Background is deep matte black.

sheet_music_viewer.style: Clean white/off-white paper texture on dark background. Controls fade out when not in use.

images.description: Close up of violin bridge and strings, warm wood tones

images.usage: Sheet Music Library Header, Composers section

instructions_to_main_agent: INSTALL: npm install @fontsource/playfair-display @fontsource/manrope lucide-react framer-motion clsx tailwind-merge
SETUP: Add the Google Fonts imports in main.jsx or index.css.
COMPONENT_OVERRIDE: Do NOT use default Shadcn cards. Use the custom 'glass-dark' style defined in colors/cards above.

TUNER: Implement the Violin Tuner using the Web Audio API (navigator.mediaDevices.getUserMedia). The UI should be a canvas or SVG gauge. DO NOT use a library if possible, or use a very lightweight one. It must detect pitch.
SHEET_MUSIC: For the MVP, use a simple Image/PDF viewer or a mock render for 'Twinkle Twinkle'. Do not overengineer a VexFlow implementation unless confident.
ROUTING: Use react-router-dom. Create a Layout component with a Sidebar (Desktop) / Bottom Nav (Mobile).
STATE: Use localStorage for saving progress (completed lessons, practice streak). No backend auth required as per constraints.
ACCESSIBILITY: Ensure all text meets contrast ratios against the dark background. Use aria-labels for the Tuner.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Do NOT apply universal transition: all. Use specific transitions.
Do NOT center align the app container.
All interactive elements MUST have data-testid attributes.
Maintain the Dark Warm aesthetic strictly. No cold blues or cyans unless absolutely necessary for a specific indicator.
